sourcesContent:
<template lang="pug">
  #Clothing(style="height: 100%")
    section(style="height: 80%;")
      carousel(:src="card.pictures")
      //- v-img(:src="card.pictures[0]", style="height: 100%; border-radius: 6px")
    div(ref="infosection", style="position: absolute; bottom: 0; width: 100%;")
      v-fade-transition
        v-btn.mb-2.px-4.text-capitalize(v-show="!expanded", rounded, depressed, x-small, color="tyellow", style="border: 2px solid black") Ver Más Info
      v-card.pt-4.ma-3.text-left.section(flat, tile, :ripple="false", :class="{'collapsed': !expanded, 'expanded': expanded}")
        v-layout.pl-4(justify-space-between)
          .mr-2
            h3 {{card.brand}}
            p {{card.name | truncate}}
          .mb-5.mt-4.py-3.px-4(v-if="card.price != '0€'", style="background-color: black; border-radius: 50px 0 0 50px;", align-center)
            h3.white--text {{card.price}}
        .px-4
          .font-weight-bold Descripción
          div Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua. Ut enim ad minim veniam, quis nostrud exercitation ullamco laboris nisi ut aliquip ex ea commodo consequat.
          .mt-6.font-weight-bold Popularidad en Amazon
          div {{card.rating}}
</template>

<script lang="ts">
import Vue from 'vue';
import Carousel from '@/components/carousel.vue';

export default Vue.extend({
  filters: {
    truncate(value) {
      const str = value.toString();
      if (str.length >= 60) return `${str.substr(0, 60)}...`;
      return str;
    },
  },

  components: {
    Carousel,
  },

  props: {
    card: {
      type: Object,
      default: () => {},
    },
    expanded: {
      type: Boolean,
      default: false,
    },
  },
});
</script>

<style lang="scss" scoped>
  .section {
    height:600px;
    overflow:hidden;
    transition:max-height 0.15s ease-out; // note that we're transitioning max-height, not height!
  }

  .collapsed {
    max-height:100px; // still have to hard-code a value!
  }

  .expanded {
    max-height:460px;
  }
</style>
